Class WorkloadThread

  • java.lang.Object

    public final class WorkloadThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that stores and computes Workload instances.

      • computeWorkload

        private void computeWorkload(Workload workload)
        Runs Workload.compute() if Workload.shouldExecute() is true. also reschedules if Workload.reSchedule() is true.

        Parameters:
        workload - Workload to compute
